title: EVRART ORB / fishing rod convo
description: Quick attempt to catch the fishing rod...

dialogueTree.title: Reaction Speed: "Is that an Insulindian phasmid? It..."
dialogueTree.english: Is that an Insulindian phasmid? It looks like an Insulindian phasmid. Quick -- catch it before it scuttles away!
dialogueTree.polish: Czy to insulindiański straszyk? Tak wygląda. Szybko, złap go, zanim ucieknie!
dialogueTree.belarusian: Ці гэта інсуліндыянская палкаходка? Так выглядае. Хутка, лаві яго, пакуль не ўцяк!

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's gotta be the phasmid this time..."
links.english: It's gotta be the phasmid this time. Look -- it moved!
links.polish: Tym razem to musi być straszyk. Patrz – poruszył się!
links.belarusian: На гэты раз гэта павінна быць палох. Глядзі – ён варухнуўся!

links.title: You: ""Stop right there!""
links.english: "Stop right there!"
links.polish: „Stój natychmiast!”
links.belarusian: "Стань адразу!"

links.title: Fishing Rod: "You shout at what you thought to be..."
links.english: You shout at what you thought to be a phasmid, but turns out to be a fishing rod.
links.polish: Krzyczysz do czegoś, co, jak sądzisz, jest straszykiem. Okazuje się jednak, że to tylko wędka.
links.belarusian: Ты крычыш да чагось, што, як ты думаеш, з'яўляецца страшыдлам. Аказваецца, што гэта толькі вуда.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""What are you trying to accomplish,..."
links.english: "What are you trying to accomplish, Harry?"
links.polish: „Co ty próbujesz zdziałać, Harry?”
links.belarusian: "Што ты спрабуеш зрабіць, Гары?"

links.title: You: ""Uh, it's a novel fishing method.""
links.english: "Uh, it's a novel fishing method."
links.polish: „Yyy, to taka nowatorska metoda połowu”.
links.belarusian: "Э-э, гэта такая інавацыйная метода лоўлі".

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Perhaps we should try it out in th..."
links.english: "Perhaps we should try it out in the wild sometime."
links.polish: „Może powinniśmy się kiedyś wybrać na łono natury”.
links.belarusian: "Можа, калі-небудзь нам варта выбрацца на прыроду".

links.title: You: ""Sorry, I thought the fishing rod w..."
links.english: "Sorry, I thought the fishing rod was... something else."
links.polish: „Przepraszam, myślałem, że ta wędka to... coś innego”.
links.belarusian: "Прабачце, я думаў, што гэтая вуда... нешта іншае".

links.title: Evrart Claire: "His great belly ripples with laught..."
links.english: His great belly ripples with laughter. "A skinny, shy young girl? Never mind."
links.polish: Jego imponujący brzuch faluje pod wpływem śmiechu. „Nieśmiałym szczupłym dziewczęciem? A nie, nic”.
links.belarusian: Яго ўражлівы жывот вагальные пад уплывам смеху. "Саромлівым хударлявым дзяўчынам? А не, нічога".

links.title: You: ""I was just trying to surprise you...."
links.english: "I was just trying to surprise you. To throw you off, you know."
links.polish: „Próbowałem cię zaskoczyć. No wiesz, zbić z tropu”.
links.belarusian: "Я спрабаваў цябе здзівіць. Ну, ведаеш, збіць з толку".

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Well, you certainly succeeded, Har..."
links.english: "Well, you certainly succeeded, Harry." He adjust himself in the chair. "You are a very surprising police officer indeed."
links.polish: „Winszuję, udało ci się” – poprawia się w fotelu. „Taki już zaskakujący z ciebie milicjant”.
links.belarusian: "Віншую, у цябе атрымалася", — папраўляецца ў крэсле. "Такі ўжо ты неспадзяваны міліцыянт".

links.title: You: "Pirouette toward the phasmid."
links.english: Pirouette toward the phasmid.
links.polish: Zbliż się piruetami do straszyka.
links.belarusian: Падбярыся пируэтамі да палохі.

links.title: Fishing Rod: "Beautiful leap! But this isn't a ph..."
links.english: Beautiful leap! But this isn't a phasmid in your hand -- it is a fishing rod.
links.polish: Przepiękny skok! Ale to, co trzymasz w ręce, nie jest straszykiem. To wędka.
links.belarusian: Прыгажэйшы скачок! Але тое, што ты трымаеш у руцэ, не ёсць палохам. Гэта вуда.

links.title: You: "Creep up to the phasmid quietly."
links.english: Creep up to the phasmid quietly.
links.polish: Podkradnij się do straszyka po cichu.
links.belarusian: Падкрадзіся да страхавіка ціха.

links.title: Fishing Rod: "You're a master of stealth. But loo..."
links.english: You're a master of stealth. But look what you've caught -- not a phasmid, but a fishing rod!
links.polish: Jesteś mistrzem skradania się. Ale popatrz tylko, co złapałeś – to nie straszyk, a wędka!
links.belarusian: Вы майстар падкрадання. Але паглядзі толькі, што злавіў – гэта не страшок, а вудзільна!

links.title: You: "Wait a moment. Is that really the p..."
links.english: Wait a moment. Is that really the phasmid? You don't want to make a fool out of yourself.
links.polish: Ale chwila, czy to naprawdę ten straszyk? Wolałbyś nie zrobić z siebie durnia.
links.belarusian: Але хвіліначку, ці гэта сапраўды той страшыльнік? Лепш не рабіць з сябе дурня.

links.title: Fishing Rod: "Definitely not a phasmid. Definitel..."
links.english: Definitely not a phasmid. Definitely a fishing rod.
links.polish: To zdecydowanie nie straszyk, a po prostu wędka.
links.belarusian: Гэта дакладна не казурка-палачнік, а проста вуда.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I see you're admiring my fishing g..."
links.english: "I see you're admiring my fishing gear. Are you by any chance a fisherman yourself?"
links.polish: „Widzę, że podziwiasz mój sprzęt wędkarski. A może przypadkiem sam wędkujesz?”
links.belarusian: "Бачу, што цэніш маё рыбалоўнае абсталяванне. А можа ты сам выпадкова займаешся рыбалкай?"

links.title: You: ""Fisherman? Totally. It's all I do..."
links.english: "Fisherman? Totally. It's all I do for fun."
links.polish: „Czy wędkuję? Wiadomo. To moja ulubiona rozrywka”.
links.belarusian: "Ці лавлю рыбу? Вядома. Гэта маё любімае забаўка".

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I thought so, Harry, I thought so...."
links.english: "I thought so, Harry, I thought so. We should go out together sometime. Bond like men of worth and value."
links.polish: „Tak właśnie myślałem, Harry. Musimy się kiedyś wybrać razem. Dwaj wartościowi ludzie na męskiej wyprawie. To łączy”.
links.belarusian: "Так я і думаў, Гары. Мы павінны як-небудзь выбрацца разам. Два годныя чалавекі на мужчынскім паходзе. Гэта яднае".

links.title: You: ""I think maybe I used to be the Fis..."
links.english: "I think maybe I used to be the Fisher King..."
links.polish: „Tak sobie myślę, że mogłem być kiedyś wędkarskim królem...”
links.belarusian: "Так сабе думаю, што калісьці мог быць каралём рыбалоўства..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Ha ha, maybe you were.""
links.english: "Ha ha, maybe you were."
links.polish: „Ha, ha, wcale niewykluczone”.
links.belarusian: "Ха, ха, зусім не выключана".

links.title: You: ""Nah, I'm just sizing you up. Study..."
links.english: "Nah, I'm just sizing you up. Studying your strengths and weaknesses."
links.polish: „Nie, obserwuję cię tylko. Sprawdzam twoje słabe i mocne strony”.
links.belarusian: "Не, я толькі назіраю за табой. Правяраю твае слабкія і моцныя бакі".

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I doubt you'll learn anything from..."
links.english: "I doubt you'll learn anything from that fishing rod."
links.polish: „Ta wędka wiele ci nie powie”.
links.belarusian: "Гэта вуда табе шмат не скажа".
